content: *this simple crochet backpack is perfect for school the supermarket or summer trips lion brand yarn * skill level easy level 2 wool-ease® thick & quick® article #640 or hometown usa® article #135 2 colors 4 balls total a 3 balls b 1 ball worked in rounds of single_crochet u s finish with crocheted tie cord available in different lion brand yarns **wool-ease® thick & quick® article #640 ** 70607ad drawstring backpack 1 2008 *raspberry & cilantro* 80406ad drawstring backpack 2 2009 *raspberry & navy* **hometown usa® article #135 ** 90271ad state fair backpack 3 2009 *washington denim & honolulu pink* *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70607ad html 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/80406ad html 3 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/90271ad html
